aboutMe.name: Jesús Eduardo Arias Díaz Web Developer
aboutMe.aboutMe: Final semester Computer Systems Engineering student. Focused on creating efficient and scalable solutions. Concentrated on my current stack but open to learning new technologies.

project1.title: Hello Kitty Chat Bot
project1.text: I develop a chatbot with Hello Kitty's personality using Gemini API. I used Next.js for interface & Tauri to convert it into a desktop app.

project2.title: PetSet
project2.text: Developing a multilanguage Saas for veterinary clinic management. It includes PDF generation, autorization  & permissions, emails sending and security with JWT.

project3.title: API REST dentist
project3.text: I developed a REST API using NestJS, TypeORM, PostgreSQL, and Docker. Using optimizations with query parameters for searching in endpoints, soft deletes, data validation, and security with JWT.

institution1.description: Focused on web development, algorithms, data structures, software engineering, and computer networks.

institution2.degree: High School with a specialization in Programming
institution2.description: Intensive program covering programmaing, databases, and basic software engineering principles.
